sub_title: Leading and growing People & Localization at Booking.com
summary:
Driven to support people and their development, so they consistently can reach the goals

I have been leading and involved in teams with a focus on our employees: their engagement, self-development, motivation and teamwork. For example, involved in the creation of the Motivation Conversation Framework for the Team Leads that has been rolled out in our track, involved in revamping a mentoring programme for around 200 employees and doing individual coaching and mentoring sessions.

I have been a driver and a leader, as well as an integral part of various international teams in bringing out the best version of our employees locally, regionally and globally. 
For example, driving a team on revamping our region's engagement group with more than a 100% increase in engagement as per the group's metrics. Lastly, a part of a team managing the company's learning group of 5000+ people, where I am supporting the creation of a passionate learner community!

Individually I support others globally on workshop facilitation, soft skills, learning and project management.

Would love to connect with you!

certifications.name: Using Questions to Foster Critical Thinking and Curiosity

projects.title: Youth Exchange "Workout Europe!"
projects.description:
The project, within the framework of "Youth in Action", covered healthy lifestyle, street workout and yoga. 
Location: Bojnice, Slovakia

contributors.headline: Leading and growing People & Localization at Booking.com
Creating inspiring workplaces & empowering people | Currently scaling teams @ Bitvavo

projects.title: Youth Exchange "Finding Yourself in Europe"
projects.description:
The project covered youth unemployment and how skill building can help youth to find a job, as well as job interviews, intercultural communication, opportunities for youth in the EU and teamwork.
In total, twenty participants from four countries (Slovakia, Italy, Belgium, Greece)

contributors.headline: Leading and growing People & Localization at Booking.com

projects.title: Workshop ''Tales for a Fair Europe''
projects.description:
The workshop took place from 1 – 8 June 2013 in ex-monastery of Frati Minori Cappuccini in Melilli, Sicily, Italy.
The workshop was focused on storytelling and intergeneration cooperation, along with skills for presenting, writing and planning a project, use of non-verbal communication units for communication, as well as how to use one's voice.

Co-funded by the Life Long Learning Programme and coordinated by "Lunaria"

profile_positions.description:
Pilot role focused on supporting Regional Team Leads in reaching our regional goals.
Supporting the Regional Manager in implementing regional strategies.
Driving regional and global initiatives related to Localization
Managing 2 Localization teams in The Netherlands and Finland (10 people)
profile_positions.title: Area Lead Content Agency (Pilot)

profile_positions.description:
In 2021 H1, invited to join my Department's Operation Leadership team and provide my input and contribute the whole 2021.
Managed and coordinated a global key operational project for my department (key role in the current and next 5 year operational plan), coordinating with multiple high level stakeholders, creating communication and change management plans, as well as numerous improvements. 

- Recruit, interview and hire. In total, I have participated in 100+ interviews for various Operational and Managerial roles. I myself have recruited 10 Specialists in my teams.

Proactively engaged globally through various projects supporting Operational Efficiency and People Development:
- Key driver for Learning and Development in my region promoting and managing learning initiatives
- Created a business case to improve a key metric for a track with a solution to the key issue for the metric. The case was approved and applied to the entire track.
- Created multiple solutions, including guidelines, for performance reviews in my department for global use and launch sponsored by our HR BP.
- Co-created a solution using google sheets & scripts that enabled a track to reach its targets for 2019 H2.

Leading and managing 4 content teams (12 people) in Finland, Hungary, the Netherlands. 
- From September 2020 teams in Finland, Hungary & the Netherlands.
- Till September 2020 teams in Finland and Estonia.
- Till April 2020 teams in Finland, Estonia and Sweden.

Hired 4 people in 4 months in a highly challenging market
An interviewer in more than 70 interviews for Specialist and Team Leader roles.

Rebuilt a team from scratch into a highly effective team that has been able to deliver as per the SLAs & KPIs since its first months together.

- Remotely co-organized a Regional meeting for Team Leads and a 3-hour workshop on storytelling for leaders.

Being mentored by a Team Lead and a Regional Manager (each with 10+ years of experience), at my own initiative.

profile_positions.title: Content Team Lead - Finland, the Netherlands, Hungary

profile_positions.description:
- The driver for a team focused on regional engagement. After revamping the regional group, engagement has grown by more than 100%.
- Driver for a team behind an initiative on raising motivation globally for our track. It created multiple conversations on motivation within teams, greater appreciation for our role and  we created a Motivation Conversation Framework.
- Involved in a team for revamping and managing the operations for a 200+ people mentoring programme.
- Doing coaching and mentoring sessions on self-development and efficiency, as well as soft skills.
- Together with my Team Lead created a mindset change plan for their teams that was successfully implemented.
- Part of the company's 5000+ people learning group's admin team where, together with others, we are supporting a community of passionate learners.
-Assisting my peers on learning, feedback and workshop development which has resulted in multiple workshops on soft skills being organised

- Highly invested in learning about management via various online courses and applying the methods to the teams I am involved in or driving
- Actively innovating with new ideas locally and globally
profile_positions.title: Language Specialist - Latvian

profile_positions.description:
Helsinging Street Workout opened the first Street Workout Gym in Finland (Helsinki, Kera) in 2022, on top of already owning a gym focused on street workout in Katajanokka (Helsinki).
Besides the gyms, HSW offers street workout training courses and private training from certified trainers.

I joined the organization at the start of 2022 and support the other Board Members, who are based in Finland, remotely.
- Hosting and facilitating board meetings
- Coaching and mentoring the Founder on leadership and people management, and operations
- Incorporating strategic and tactical thinking, Operational Excellence (LEAN) in how HSW is run
profile_positions.title: Board Member & Co-Owner - Remote

profile_positions.description:
Fulbright Scholar Programme 
Funded by the United States Department of State and organised by FHI360 for Student Leaders from Europe on Civic Engagement
The only participant from Latvia who was chosen from a pool of talented students in the whole country by the United States Department of State and The United States Embassy in Latvia.

– Sessions on civic engagement, how to write a project, how do NGOs and organisations operate in the U.S., leadership and team building
– Provided by the best professionals in their field, in the state of South Carolina

profile_positions.title: European Voluntary Service Volunteer

volunteer_experiences.description:
–Organising seminars, educational workshops and projects for youth, by training the new student council and youth organisation leaders, as well as by bridging the gap between elderly and youth through various cooperation projects: sharing stories via videos made by youth, exchanging skills, joining events.
–Planning and organising events for youth (cultural, sports, educational etc.) (around 80 in total) that has improved community and social life of many families through charity, sport, cultural and educational projects and events.

Accomplishments: award "Volunteer of the Year" (received 2 years in a row) for volunteering 100+ hours a year for my hometown/local community and youth organisation.
Involved in organising events for up to a 1000 people.
